title: Drawing Shapes with Matplotlib Widgets
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use the RectangleSelector and EllipseSelector widgets in Matplotlib to draw a rectangle or ellipse from the initial click position to the current mouse position.

meta.title: Matplotlib | RectangleSelector | EllipseSelector | Python Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to use the RectangleSelector and EllipseSelector widgets in Matplotlib to draw shapes in this comprehensive Python programming tutorial.
